meanings.sent1: Her harsh words imbittered his heart.
meanings.sent3: The burnt coffee imbittered his morning routine.
meanings.sent4: The loss imbittered his outlook on life.
meanings.sent5: The bitter taste of failure imbittered his spirit.

meanings.definition: To cause someone to feel bitter or resentful
meanings.sent1: His constant criticism imbittered her emotions.
meanings.sent2: The unfair treatment imbittered the employees.
meanings.sent3: The rainy weather imbittered their picnic plans.
meanings.sent4: The long wait imbittered their patience.
meanings.sent5: The broken promise imbittered their trust.
